Name.label: Acute poisoning by drugs with membrane-stabilizing effect
Particular clinical situation in a disease or syndrome
Rare intoxication due to medical products

TextSection.Contents: A rare, potentially life-threatening disorder due to toxic effects. The principle drugs involved are tricyclic antidepressants, chloroquine, some types of beta blockers, class IA antiarrhythmics, carbamazepin and cocaine.
